name: DROP ENRICH POLICY
description: Delete an enrich policy and its associated enrich index. Pipelines using this policy will fail.

clauses.name: IF EXISTS
clauses.description: Don't raise an error if the policy doesn't exist

examples.title: Drop if exists
examples.sql: DROP ENRICH POLICY IF EXISTS temporary_policy

notes: Associated enrich index is also deleted
Pipelines using this policy will fail until updated
